scenario_text.value: Hey, you got a minute?
Hm? What’s up?
(What should I say to Kaito?)
I’ll take care of Miu.
Don’t go too far.
You scared?
I’ll take care of Miu.

Listen, if anything happens to you, Kaito,
I’ll take care of Miu.
Huh? What do you mean by that?

I’m saying if you don’t make it, I’ll be sure
to look after your sister, so don’t worry.
Wait, you don’t have a thing for Miu, do you?
What? No! That’s not what I meant at all!
Okay, as long as that’s clear.

Anyway, you don’t have to tell me. I know you
and the others will look after her.

I’ll be counting on that if anything happens
to me.

Kaito, we’re coming up on the final battle,
but I want you to know.
Don’t be reckless.
Don’t be reckless.
I won’t. And that goes for you too.

I am going to live through this and go home,
no matter what. Me, Miu, and everyone else.
You scared?
You scared, Kaito?

Why? Are you? Lose your nerve right before
the big fight with the Master?
Hey, come on, I was asking about you!

Well, to tell you the truth, I am scared. Not
that I might get hurt or die or anything.
But if anything were to happen to Miu...
Yeah, that’s what I thought you’d say.
Heh, but that’s not all.

That goes for you and all the others too.
I don’t want to lose any of you.

Funny, isn’t it? Laugh if you want to. Lately
I’ve been worrying about more than my sister.

Nah, I won’t laugh at you for that. After
all, that’s a good thing.
Yeah...
Hey, Takuma. I have a favor to ask you.

Talking with you really helped clear my head,
but look around.

Some of the others still look pretty upset.
We can’t have that, now can we?

I want you to talk with them, Takuma. It’s
something only you can do.
Sure thing. I’ll do my best to cheer them up.

Come on, Takuma, go cheer the others up like
you did for me.
